casebody.data:
STATE
v.
LeMorris J. CHAPMAN. No. 146A02. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Kelly D. Miller, for Chapman. Michael Beam, III, Smithfield, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of March 2004 by Defendant to Hold Decision Pending the United States Supreme Court's Decision in Roper v. Simmons:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2004."
